headline: Advanced Micro Devices (NasdaqGS:AMD) Urges Shareholders To Vote Against Proposal On Shareholder Meeting Rules
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (NasdaqGS:AMD) has recently been in focus due to its response to a shareholder proposal by John Chevedden. The company urged shareholders to vote against a proposal regarding the removal of a provision affecting the eligibility to call special meetings, indicating a proactive stance in maintaining its current governance structure. Over the past week, AMD's share price rose 0.66%, amid the tech sector's rally led by heavyweights like Nvidia, despite the broader market's...

headline: Intel Gets the Outsider CEO It Desperately Needs
summary: After months of searching for a new CEO following the abrupt retirement of former CEO Pat Gelsinger, Intel (NASDAQ: INTC) has landed on Lip-Bu Tan.  Tan led Cadence Design Systems, a provider of software for designing semiconductor chips, for more than a decade.  Under Gelsinger, Intel invested heavily in manufacturing in an attempt to build its own foundry business.
